42 template <typename Left, typename Right>
43 inline auto add(const Left& left, const Right& right)
44  -> decltype(left.add(right)) {
45  return left.add(right);
46 }
47 
49 
57 template <
58  typename Left, typename Right, typename Scalar,
59  typename std::enable_if<detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
60 inline auto add(const Left& left, const Right& right, const Scalar factor) {
61  return left.add(right, factor);
62 }
63 
65 
72 template <typename Left, typename Right>
73 inline auto add(const Left& left, const Right& right, const Permutation& perm) {
74  return left.add(right, perm);
75 }
76 
78 
87 template <
88  typename Left, typename Right, typename Scalar,
89  typename std::enable_if<detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
90 inline auto add(const Left& left, const Right& right, const Scalar factor,
91  const Permutation& perm) {
92  return left.add(right, factor, perm);
93 }

102 template <typename Result, typename Arg>
103 inline Result& add_to(Result& result, const Arg& arg) {
104  return result.add_to(arg);
105 }
106 
108 
116 template <
117  typename Result, typename Arg, typename Scalar,
118  typename std::enable_if<detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
119 inline Result& add_to(Result& result, const Arg& arg, const Scalar factor) {
120  return result.add_to(arg, factor);
121 }

123 namespace tile_interface {
124 
125 using TiledArray::add;
126 using TiledArray::add_to;
127 
128 template <typename... T>
129 using result_of_add_t = decltype(add(std::declval<T>()...));
130 
131 template <typename... T>
132 using result_of_add_to_t = decltype(add_to(std::declval<T>()...));
133 
134 // template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Enabler = void>
135 // struct add_trait {
136 // typedef Left type;
137 // };
138 //
139 // template <typename Left, typename Right>
140 // struct add_trait<Left, Right,
141 // typename std::enable_if<
142 // TiledArray::detail::is_type<result_of_add_t<Left, Right> >::value
143 // >::type>
144 // {
145 // typedef result_of_add_t<Left, Right> type;
146 // };
147 //
148 // template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Enabler = void>
149 // struct scal_add_trait :
150 // public scal_trait<typename add_trait<Left, Right>::type, Scalar>
151 // { };
152 //
153 // template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Scalar>
154 // struct scal_add_trait<Left, Right,
155 // typename std::enable_if<
156 // TiledArray::detail::is_type<result_of_add_t<Left, Right, Scalar>
157 // >::value
158 // >::type>
159 // {
160 // typedef result_of_add_t<Left, Right, Scalar> type;
161 // };
162 
163 template <typename Result, typename Left, typename Right,
164  typename Enabler = void>
165 class Add {
166  public:
167  typedef Result result_type;
168  typedef Left left_type;
169  typedef Right right_type;
170 
171  result_type operator()(const left_type& left, const right_type& right) const {
172  using TiledArray::add;
173  return add(left, right);
174  }
175 
176  result_type operator()(const left_type& left, const right_type& right,
177  const Permutation& perm) const {
178  using TiledArray::add;
179  return add(left, right, perm);
180  }
181 };
182 
183 template <typename Result, typename Left, typename Right>
184 class Add<Result, Left, Right,
185  typename std::enable_if<!(
186  std::is_same<Result, result_of_add_t<Left, Right>>::value &&
187  std::is_same<Result, result_of_add_t<Left, Right, Permutation>>::
188  value)>::type> {
189  public:
190  typedef Result result_type;
191  typedef Left left_type;
192  typedef Right right_type;
193 
194  result_type operator()(const left_type& left, const right_type& right) const {
195  using TiledArray::add;
196  TiledArray::Cast<Result, result_of_add_t<Left, Right>> cast;
197  return cast(add(left, right));
198  }
199 
200  result_type operator()(const left_type& left, const right_type& right,
201  const Permutation& perm) const {
202  using TiledArray::add;
203  TiledArray::Cast<Result, result_of_add_t<Left, Right, Permutation>> cast;
204  return cast(add(left, right, perm));
205  }
206 };
207 
208 template <typename Result, typename Left, typename Right, typename Scalar,
209  typename Enabler = void>
210 class ScalAdd {
211  public:
212  static_assert(TiledArray::detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>,
213  "Cannot scale tiles by a non-scalar type");
214 
215  typedef Result result_type;
216  typedef Left left_type;
217  typedef Right right_type;
218  typedef Scalar scalar_type;
219 
220  result_type operator()(const left_type& left, const right_type& right,
221  const scalar_type factor) const {
222  using TiledArray::add;
223  return add(left, right, factor);
224  }
225 
226  result_type operator()(const left_type& left, const right_type& right,
227  const scalar_type factor,
228  const Permutation& perm) const {
229  using TiledArray::add;
230  return add(left, right, factor, perm);
231  }
232 };
233 
234 template <typename Result, typename Left, typename Right, typename Scalar>
235 class ScalAdd<
236  Result, Left, Right, Scalar,
237  typename std::enable_if<!(
238  std::is_same<Result, result_of_add_t<Left, Right, Scalar>>::value &&
239  std::is_same<Result, result_of_add_t<Left, Right, Scalar,
240  Permutation>>::value)>::type> {
241  public:
242  static_assert(TiledArray::detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>,
243  "Cannot scale tiles by a non-scalar type");
244 
245  typedef Result result_type;
246  typedef Left left_type;
247  typedef Right right_type;
248  typedef Scalar scalar_type;
249 
250  result_type operator()(const left_type& left, const right_type& right,
251  const scalar_type factor) const {
252  using TiledArray::add;
253  TiledArray::Cast<Result, result_of_add_t<Left, Right, Scalar>> cast;
254  return cast(add(left, right, factor));
255  }
256 
257  result_type operator()(const left_type& left, const right_type& right,
258  const scalar_type factor,
259  const Permutation& perm) const {
260  using TiledArray::add;
261  TiledArray::Cast<Result, result_of_add_t<Left, Right, Scalar, Permutation>>
262  cast;
263  return cast(add(left, right, factor, perm));
264  }
265 };
266 
267 template <typename Result, typename Left, typename Right,
268  typename Enabler = void>
269 class AddTo {
270  public:
271  typedef Result result_type;
272  typedef Left left_type;
273  typedef Right right_type;
274 
275  result_type& operator()(left_type& left, const right_type& right) const {
276  using TiledArray::add_to;
277  return add_to(left, right);
278  }
279 };
280 
281 template <typename Result, typename Left, typename Right>
282 class AddTo<Result, Left, Right,
283  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<
284  Result, result_of_add_to_t<Left, Right>>::value>::type> {
285  public:
286  typedef Result result_type;
287  typedef Left left_type;
288  typedef Right right_type;
289 
290  result_type operator()(left_type& left, const right_type& right) const {
291  using TiledArray::add_to;
292  TiledArray::Cast<Result, result_of_add_to_t<Left, Right>> cast;
293  add_to(left, right);
294  return cast(left);
295  }
296 };
297 
298 template <typename Result, typename Left, typename Right, typename Scalar,
299  typename Enabler = void>
300 class ScalAddTo {
301  public:
302  static_assert(TiledArray::detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>,
303  "Cannot scale tiles by a non-scalar type");
304 
305  typedef Result result_type;
306  typedef Left left_type;
307  typedef Right right_type;
308  typedef Scalar scalar_type;
309 
310  result_type& operator()(left_type& left, const right_type& right) const {
311  using TiledArray::add_to;
312  return add_to(left, right);
313  }
314 };
315 
316 template <typename Result, typename Left, typename Right, typename Scalar>
317 class ScalAddTo<
318  Result, Left, Right, Scalar,
319  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<
320  Result, result_of_add_to_t<Left, Right, Scalar>>::value>::type> {
321  public:
322  static_assert(TiledArray::detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>,
323  "Cannot scale tiles by a non-scalar type");
324 
325  typedef Result result_type;
326  typedef Left left_type;
327  typedef Right right_type;
328  typedef Scalar scalar_type;
329 
330  result_type operator()(left_type& left, const right_type& right,
331  const scalar_type factor) const {
332  using TiledArray::add_to;
333  TiledArray::Cast<Result, result_of_add_to_t<Left, Right, Scalar>> cast;
334  add_to(left, right);
335  return cast(left);
336  }
337 };
